Model.Card
Interface Card

All Known Implementing Classes:
Advertisement, Bill, Charity, Deal_Card, Mad_Money, Move_to_Deal_Buyer, Pay_The_Neighdor
public interface Card

This is the interface of a Card that contains the methods signatures for every card

Author:
Andreas Pattakos

get_card

void get_card(Player P1,
              Player P2)
Observer: Does what the card says. (the contents of this method change from the card that implements it)
post-condition: Does what the card says.

Parameters:
P1 - for the Player who takes the card
P2 - for the other Player
